segments.text: I glance into this cozy kitchen and notice the woman carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron over her dress, looking focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is right there beside her, with water running steadily from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my goodness, the water is overflowing over the edge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down onto the floor, forming a big puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to notice; her foot is already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy climbing on a stool towards the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into what looks like a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, holding her hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, I can see a nice garden outside, all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how everything seems so normal out there compared to this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
